com.vftlite.tree

Class Node

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.vftlite.tree.Node
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Tree, java.lang.Iterable<Tree>

    public class Node
extends java.lang.Object
implements Tree

    Build a node.

    The Node class implements the interface Tree. It is used as the Composite class in the Composite pattern to implements trees.

    Author:
    Saverio Meucci

      • cloneAll

        public Tree cloneAll()
              throws java.lang.Exception
        This method is used to clone a Tree object. Deep copy: it also clones the children and the field objects.
        Specified by:
        cloneAll in interface Tree
        Returns:
        It returns a new Tree that is a deep copy of the tree.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - If something goes wrong when adding a child.
